description.oldValue:
Windows Autopatch is a new service that automates the process of managing and rolling out updates for Windows and Microsoft 365 apps. By July 2022, Autopatch will be offered as a feature to Windows 10/11 Enterprise E3 at no additional cost.
GA date: July CY2022
description.newValue: Windows Autopatch is a new service that automates the process of managing and rolling out updates for Windows and Microsoft 365 apps. By July 2022, Autopatch will be offered as a feature to Windows 10/11 Enterprise E3 at no additional cost.
